h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Celestial Nonary Pill
content: If you have collected all charms throughout the chapter, you will be able to pluck the last one from the pillar and access the area behind it. There, you will find the Celestial Nonary Pill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Nonary_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Nonary Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Celestial Nonary Pill'.
The content is as follows:
If you have collected all charms throughout the chapter, you will be able to pluck the last one from the pillar and access the area behind it. There, you will find the Celestial Nonary Pill.
